key.name: auth-method
key.description: Authentication method: oauth or token

key.name: api-token
key.description: Linear Personal API Key for direct authentication

key.name: oauth-token
key.description: OAuth access token for Linear API access

key.name: refresh-token
key.description: OAuth refresh token for token renewal

key.name: token-expires-at
key.description: ISO timestamp when the access token expires

key.name: oauth-state
key.description: CSRF protection state parameter for OAuth flow

key.name: oauth-client-id
key.description: Linear OAuth application client ID

key.name: oauth-client-secret
key.description: Linear OAuth application client secret

key.name: start-oauth-flow
key.description: Trigger to start OAuth authentication flow

key.name: workspace-id
key.description: ID of the Linear workspace to monitor

key.name: polling-interval
key.description: How often to check for updates (in seconds)

key.name: notify-new-issues
key.description: Show notifications when new issues are created

key.name: notify-issue-updates
key.description: Show notifications when existing issues are updated

key.name: notify-assigned-issues
key.description: Show notifications when issues are assigned to you

key.name: notify-comments
key.description: Show notifications when comments are added to issues

key.name: notify-mentions
key.description: Show notifications when you are mentioned in issues or comments

key.name: notify-status-changes
key.description: Show notifications when issue status changes

key.name: click-action
key.description: What to do when notification is clicked

key.name: custom-command
key.description: Custom command to run when notification is clicked (use {{URL}} for issue URL)

key.name: last-update-time
key.description: ISO timestamp of last update check
